query: SELECT s.id as scooterId, s.name, s.totalDistance, s.totalRides, s.userId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ridingRecords r WHERE r.scooterId = s.id) as ridesWithScooter, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(r.id, ':', r.distance, ':', r.scooterId ORDER BY r.id DESC SEPARATOR ', ') FROM ridingRecords r WHERE r.userId = s.userId ORDER BY r.id DESC LIMIT 5) as recentRides FROM scooters s WHERE s.name LIKE '%하코%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute SELECT s.id as scooterId, s.name, s.totalDistance, s.totalRides, s.userId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ridingRecords r WHERE r.scooterId = s.id) as ridesWithScooter, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(r.id, ':', r.distance, ':', r.scooterId ORDER BY r.id DESC SEPARATOR ', ') FROM ridingRecords r WHERE r.userId = s.userId ORDER BY r.id DESC LIMIT 5) as recentRides FROM scooters s WHERE s.name LIKE '%하코%';
